item.title: Sultry Zinfandels for Summer | Wine Enthusiast Magazine
item.description:
Sultry Zinfandels for Summer | Wine Enthusiast Magazine

Zinfandel has long been one of America's favorite varieties, prized for its fruity berry flavors and spicy notes of pepper, licorice and vanilla. It's a lot of people's favorite match with barbecue, making it great for savoring in the summer. It also doesn't hurt that Zinfandel provides fistfuls of flavor and intrigue for $50 and under.
